name: Half Day Sea Kayak Turtle Tour
description: Embark on a serene kayaking adventure on the tranquil blue waters of the Whitsundays. Perfect for families, couples, and groups of friends, this half-day tour offers an intimate connection with nature. Paddle through stunning seascapes and keep an eye out for majestic sea turtles. Experience the beauty of the Whitsundays from a unique perspective, making it an unforgettable outing for nature lovers and adventure seekers.
includes:
Double kayak hire
All necessary gear
Toilet and shower facilities
Dry bags
Water and sunscreen
highlights:
Family-friendly activity
Great for couples and groups of friends
Explore the Whitsunday region
One and a half hour kayak adventure
Beautiful blue Australian waters
ideal_for: Families, couples, groups of friends, and nature enthusiasts

name: Half Day Sea Kayak Turtle Tour
description: Discover the beauty of Airlie Beach with a guided kayak turtle tour! Paddle through the turquoise waters, exploring the picturesque town from a unique angle. This adventure is perfect for couples and families, offering an exciting introduction to the Whitsundays. Enjoy the thrill of spotting turtles while cruising the foreshore of Airlie Beach, making stops at three main beaches for a swim and relaxation.
includes:
Toilet, shower facility
Dry bags
Water and sunscreen provided
1 Hour Paddle Board Hire Free
highlights:
Guided kayak turtle tour
Explore the turquoise waters of Airlie Beach
Spot turtles and enjoy the sights
Visit three main beaches
Swim at stinger net and closure
Great for couples and families
Introduction to the Whitsundays
price_tiers: Adult (Ages 16+): A$99 | Child (Ages 15 and under): A$89
age_requirements: Ages 16+ for adults, Ages 15 and under for children
ideal_for: Couples and families looking for a fun and engaging introduction to the Whitsundays.
important_information: ['Adult | Double Kayak Ages 16+ | Solo paddlers will be paired with another solo or guide', 'Child | Double Kayak Ages 15 and under | Solo paddlers will be paired with another solo or guide']

name: Scenic Shores Sunset Kayak
description: Experience a relaxing and gentle paddle just off the picturesque foreshore of Airlie Beach. Perfect for families, couples, and solo travelers, especially those new to kayaking. Enjoy the ambient atmosphere and spectacular views as you glide through the waters. This tour caters to inexperienced paddlers, ensuring a safe and enjoyable experience while highlighting the beautiful backdrop of Airlie Beach.
includes:
Single stable sit on top kayak
Life jacket
Dry bag
Kayak guide
Photos
Storage available free of charge
highlights:
Relaxing gentle paddle
Spectacular views of Airlie Beach
Family-friendly experience
Ideal for inexperienced paddlers
Photos included
price_tiers: Adult: A$59 | Child (15 and under): A$49
ideal_for: Families, couples, solo travelers, and inexperienced paddlers

name: Half Day Sea Kayak Turtle Tour
description: Embark on a thrilling half-day adventure with the Sea Kayak Turtle Tour, perfect for those seeking a unique way to explore the stunning Whitsundays. Paddle through crystal-clear waters, discover hidden beaches, and enjoy the company of friendly marine life, including sea turtles. Ideal for families, couples, and adventure enthusiasts, this tour combines excitement with the serene beauty of the ocean.
includes:
Kayak hire
Safety briefing and equipment
Guided tour
highlights:
Explore the Whitsundays by kayak
Spot sea turtles and other marine life
Visit secluded beaches
Suitable for beginners and experienced kayakers
Great for families and couples
ideal_for: Families, couples, and adventure seekers looking to explore the Whitsundays in a unique and active way.
